text: The Chhattisgarh women's cricket team is an Indian domestic cricket team representing the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. The team has represented the state in Senior women's one day league (List A) and Senior women's T20 league. ==References== Category:2016 establishments in India Category:Cricket in Chhattisgarh Category:Sport in Chhattisgarh Category:Women's cricket teams in India
title: Chhattisgarh women's cricket team
